com.gridgraph.structure.lifecycle

Class GridGraphLifeCycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.structure.lifecycle.GridGraphLifeCycle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.util.LifeCycleHook

    public class GridGraphLifeCycle
extends Object
implements org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.util.LifeCycleHook
    GridGraphLifeCycle is an implementation of gremlin LifeCycleHook, acting as hook of server startup and shutdown

    guobao.chen
